message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very useful. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate it, but I am only able to pay up to $8,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your offer but $8,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $9,000, which I believe is fair considering the value of the product. Let's meet in the middle on this one!
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am still unable to go above $8,500. I hope this proposal works for you.
